title: Strategies for Building Social Relationships in Online Mathematics Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Emphasis on flexible learning schedules for working professionals and enhancing learning satisfaction through weak-tie (bridging capital) formation with peer learners

learning_goals: Learners construct at least two instances of bridging social capital by collaborating with peers on online collaborative projects.
Learners exchange peer feedback at least twice weekly using the discussion board within the LMS.
Learners acquire three or more mathematical problem-solving strategies through network formation with peer learners.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
